catList: The purpose of this course is to enhance the students' understanding, planning, developing and managing various e-business models and organizational impact and transformational value of e-business and e-commerce systems. Integration of E-Technologies into the major functional areas of organizations and differences between conventional and web-based companies are discussed.

This course, organized as a series of seminars by prominent IT practitioners, aims to enhance the participants' understanding of the integration of e-technologies into major functional areas of organizations. Participants will gain a perspective of the strategic role of and issues in managing IT as manifested in e-business applications, as a driver and enabler of business transformation, and as an underlying infrastructure for all businesses. The seminars are run throughout the academic year.
